name: set_explosion_behavior
description: Defines the behavior of the explosions that happen when this <%= doc_class_name %> is destroyed.

parameters.name: number
parameters.desc: The number of explosions that happen on deletion.

parameters.name: speed
parameters.desc: The rate at which the explosions happen.

parameters.name: is_boss
parameters.desc: Whether this is considered a "boss-type" <%= doc_class_name %>.
